system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal
Effect: All valid targets become Bound 4. While Bound, they take a Tick of HP in damage at the end of each of their activations. The user may freely move up to the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack.
Requirement: [Water] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Water-Type attack on the user's Active List.
